name: Sei
headline: AI-powered Regulatory Compliance Platform
description: Simplify your regulatory compliance. Sei's AI agents sit alongside your risk and compliance teams, amplifying impact and scale

founders.name: Pranay Shetty, Founder
founders.description: Pranay is the CEO of Sei. He has worked across investment banking, private equity, and fintech. Most recently he was an early employee at CloudKitchens, helping launch the business across the US & Asia.

founders.name: Ramkumar Venkataraman, Founder
founders.description: Engineer with over a decade building payments and high-scale systems in PayPal, Wise, and Amazon. Believes in the power of AI to help create responsible brands

generated_description:
### Sei: Your AI-Powered Compliance Partner

Sei is an innovative startup on a mission to redefine regulatory compliance through the power of artificial intelligence. Founded in 2023 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Sei emerged from the idea to simplify regulatory compliance processes. Based in Delhi, India, and leveraging a small yet dynamic team, Sei is dedicated to enhancing the effectiveness and scalability of risk and compliance operations by deploying AI agents that work alongside human teams.

**Why Sei?**  
Sei positions itself as a specialized AI platform for customer experience (CX) and compliance teams, aiming to streamline various processes such as customer support, collections, and compliance workflows. The platform's billing point is its ability to drastically improve metrics—reporting a 75% increase in customer Net Promoter Score (NPS) and a 60% reduction in handle times.

**Key Features of Sei's AI Agents:**

1. **Multichannel Interaction**: Sei's AI agents can communicate via voice, email, and chat, allowing them to handle tasks like payment collections, account inquiries, and verification workflows efficiently.
   
2. **Compliance Management**: The agents are designed to manage compliance tasks by ingesting custom policies, monitoring regulatory changes, and providing real-time alerts for escalated fraud or legal concerns.

3. **Quality Assurance and Agent Productivity**: By automating repetitive workflows, Sei's AI can reduce post-call times and enhance productivity among human agents, facilitating better quality assurance processes.

4. **Multimodal Workflows**: Sei integrates with various platforms, providing seamless interaction across customer support, quality assurance, and product teams, while also supporting over 15 languages.

5. **Security First**: Understanding the sensitivity of data in financial institutions, Sei is built with a strict compliance framework and is SOC2 Type 2 compliant, ensuring high standards of data privacy and security.

**Get Involved**  
Sei is forging relationships with various industries, including banks, fintechs, and insurance. With its AI solutions, businesses can significantly cut costs—up to 70%—by automating manual and repetitive workflows.

If you’re looking to scale your compliance and customer support operations with AI but aren’t sure where to start, Sei offers personalized demos to showcase how their technology can fit into your existing systems.

**Want to Learn More?**  
Check out their website [Sei Right](https://seiright.com/) for more details and to schedule a demo. 

In a world where compliance is non-negotiable and efficiency is key, Sei is here to ensure you don’t just keep up—you get ahead.
